title: A request for champion select.
body: Can we have more time to figure out who we are playing. in solo que it takes some time to figure out what will go best with your comp, and to listen to people typing shit in chat, so sometimes we need some more time to figure our shit out.

replies.body: Or... Now just hear me out, this might sound crazy but here goes; don't argue with each other over roles and act like its draft pick. (prepares for the downvotes)
I agree, we have seconds to make a decision out of 120 options
or, do what most of us do and don't pay attestation to the chat. Just call something and if it's yours then do it.
